---
title: Linear regression overview
---

Model:

$$
y_i \sim \text{normal}(\mu_i, \sigma)
$$

$$
\mu_i = \alpha + \beta \cdot x_i
$$

Parameters needing priors:

- $\alpha$ (intercept)
- $\beta$ (predictor weights)
- $\sigma$ (observation model standard deviation)

Data:

- $y$ (continuous outcome)
- $x$ (predictors)
